So, I guess I have about one month left of free do-nothing time.

topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558a9b8263687252a9001513#post_558a9b8263687252a9001513
Thank ya, frozen AJ.

I wonder if I can handle college life. 
I mean, I lived with my parents my entire life.
This is a huge step to me. I'll be living on my own for the first time. I'll be handling my own schedules, doing my own laundry and buying my own stuff without jurisdiction. My life now under my own choices completely and I will be the only one facing the consequences of my false actions.

Wow, this is big to me.
